text:
Temporary increase of capital limit of Contingencies Fund
	Section 1(1) of the Contingencies Fund Act 1974 (which provides that thecapital of the Contingencies Fund must not exceed 2 per cent of the authorisedsupply expenditure for the year ending on the previous 31 March) is to haveeffect in relation to times after 31 March 2021 but before 1 April 2022 as ifthe reference to 2 per cent were to 12 per cent.
Short title
	This Act may be cited as the Contingencies Fund Act 2021.
